description: This item can be taken to the Enchanter to add the following property to your Spell Gems:\n\nMore Charges
name: Agate

description: This item can be taken to the Enchanter to add the following property to your Spell Gems:\n\nCascading: the spell's potency is increased by 3% for each Charge the Spell Gem is missing.
name: Aquamarine

description: This item can be taken to the Enchanter to add the following property to your Spell Gems:\n\nSingular: the spell's potency is increased by 30% for each empty Spell Gem slot the creature has.
name: Aventurine

description: This item can be taken to the Enchanter to add the following property to your Spell Gems:\n\nDefense Penetration
name: Azurite

description: This item can be taken to the Enchanter to add the following property to your Spell Gems:\n\nMagnetic: the spell's potency is increased by 15% for each creature in your party with that same spell equipped.
